description:
Montreal, Nov. 26, 2012 - Rory Geoghegan reports about using Jenkins CI -- the leading open-source continuous integration server -- to test your Python code.

Useful links:

* Jenkins CI: http://jenkins-ci.org/
* MP33: http://montrealpython.org/2012/11/mp33/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Introduction to using Jenkins CI to test your Python code
